title.rendered: Durban vs Cape Town, South Africa T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Quinton de Kock and Kagiso Rabada were rested in the last night’s ODI between England and South Africa due to an injury. There is no news on whether they will resume soon.

Durban: Kyle Mayers, Matthew Breetzke, Quinton de Kock (c & wk), Wiaan Mulder, Heinrich Klaasen, Dwaine Pretorius, Keemo Paul, Simon Harmer, Hardus Viljoen, Keshav Maharaj, Reece Topley

Cape Town: Ryan Rickelton, Dewald Brevis, Grant Roelofsen (wk), Rassie van der Dussen, Sam Curran, George Linde, Delano Potgieter/Olly Stone, Rashid Khan (c), Odean Smith, Jofra Archer, Kagiso Rabada/Olly Stone

Pitch Report

Venue: Kingsmead, Durban

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 162

2nd innings average score: 170

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

At the venue this season, Quinton de Kock has hit the most runs: 148 at 49. Meanwhile, Dwaine Pretorius and Prenelan Subrayen have taken 6 wickets between them.

In the previous game between these teams, Grant Roelofsen (52 off 44 and a catch) and Olly Stone (4 for 28) were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

George Linde has been the best fantasy pick for Cape Town, producing top performances with both bat and ball. He has scored 134 runs and taken 5 wickets in 7 outings.

After a slow start to the league, Rashid Khan has finally picked up pace. Having taken 8 wickets in the last 5 games, his Ultimate Team percentage shot up to 57.

It has been an ordinary tournament for Sam Curran. In 7 games, he has managed a mere 3 wickets and 67 runs.

In the last 3 games at the venue, pacers took 27 of 40 wickets.
